harvested_crops.name: Blue Jazz
harvested_crops.description: The flower grows in a sphere to invite as many butterflies as possible.

harvested_crops.name: Carrot
harvested_crops.description: A spring tuber closely related to the parsnip. Has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.

harvested_crops.name: Cauliflower
harvested_crops.description: Valuable, but slow-growing. Despite its pale color, the florets are packed with nutrients.

harvested_crops.name: Coffee Bean
harvested_crops.description: Plant in spring or summer to grow a coffee plant. Yields multiple beans every few days!

harvested_crops.name: Garlic
harvested_crops.description: Adds a wonderful zestiness to dishes. High quality garlic can be quite valuable.

harvested_crops.name: Green Bean
harvested_crops.description: A juicy little bean with a cool, crisp snap.

harvested_crops.name: Kale
harvested_crops.description: The dark blue-green leaves are more nutritious than cabbage.

harvested_crops.name: Parsnip
harvested_crops.description: A spring tuber closely related to the carrot. It has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.

harvested_crops.name: Potato
harvested_crops.description: A widely cultivated tuber.

harvested_crops.name: Rhubarb
harvested_crops.description: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.

harvested_crops.name: Strawberry
harvested_crops.description: Widely considered the best fruit of spring.

harvested_crops.name: Tulip
harvested_crops.description: The most popular spring flower. Has a very faint sweet smell.

harvested_crops.name: Unmilled Rice
harvested_crops.description: A rough rice grain encased in a protective hull.

harvested_crops.name: Blueberry
harvested_crops.description: A popular berry reported to have many health benefits. The blue skin has the highest nutrient concentration.

harvested_crops.name: Corn
harvested_crops.description: One of the most popular grains. The sweet, fresh cobs are a summer favorite.

harvested_crops.name: Hops
harvested_crops.description: A bitter, tangy flower used to flavor beer.

harvested_crops.name: Hot Pepper
harvested_crops.description: Fiery hot! Clears the sinuses.

harvested_crops.name: Melon
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, juicy favorite with a wonderful aroma.

harvested_crops.name: Poppy
harvested_crops.description: In addition to its colorful flower, the Poppy has culinary and medicinal uses.

harvested_crops.name: Radish
harvested_crops.description: A crisp, refreshing root vegetable with a sharp, peppery flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Red Cabbage
harvested_crops.description: Often used in salads and coleslaws. The color can range from purple to blue to greenish-blue depending on soil conditions.

harvested_crops.name: Starfruit
harvested_crops.description: An extremely juicy fruit that grows in hot, humid weather. Slightly sweet with a sour undertone.

harvested_crops.name: Summer Spangle
harvested_crops.description: A tropical bloom that thrives in the humid summer air. Has a sweet, tangy aroma.

harvested_crops.name: Summer Squash
harvested_crops.description: A long, yellow summer vegetable. Has a mild flavor and a versatile texture.

harvested_crops.name: Sunflower
harvested_crops.description: A common misconception is that the flower turns so it's always facing the sun.

harvested_crops.name: Tomato
harvested_crops.description: Rich and slightly tangy, the Tomato has a wide variety of culinary uses.

harvested_crops.name: Wheat
harvested_crops.description: One of the most widely cultivated grains. Makes a great flour for baking.

harvested_crops.name: Amaranth
harvested_crops.description: A purple grain cultivated by an ancient civilization.

harvested_crops.name: Artichoke
harvested_crops.description: The bud of a thistle plant. The spiny outer leaves conceal a fleshy, filling interior.

harvested_crops.name: Beet
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, earthy root vegetable. Despite its imposing exterior, it has a crisp, tender flesh.

harvested_crops.name: Bok Choy
harvested_crops.description: The leaves and stalks are both edible. It's been used in ancient medicine.

harvested_crops.name: Broccoli
harvested_crops.description: A classic green vegetable. Highly nutritious.

harvested_crops.name: Cranberries
harvested_crops.description: These tart red berries are a traditional winter food.

harvested_crops.name: Eggplant
harvested_crops.description: A rich, purple vegetable. Despite the name, it has nothing to do with eggs.

harvested_crops.name: Fairy Rose
harvested_crops.description: An enchanted rose that smells like grandma's attic. Does it have magical properties?

harvested_crops.name: Grape
harvested_crops.description: A sweet cluster of fruit.

harvested_crops.name: Pumpkin
harvested_crops.description: A fall favorite, grown for its crunchy seeds and deliciously smooth flesh.

harvested_crops.name: Yam
harvested_crops.description: A starchy tuber with a lot of culinary versatility.

harvested_crops.name: Sweet Gem Berry
harvested_crops.description: It's by far the sweetest thing you've ever smelled.

harvested_crops.name: Powdermelon
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, juicy fruit with a unique powdery exterior.

harvested_crops.name: Ancient Fruit
harvested_crops.description: It's been dormant for eons.

harvested_crops.name: Apricot
harvested_crops.description: A tender little fruit with a tangy flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Cherry
harvested_crops.description: It's popular, and ripens sooner than most spring crops.

harvested_crops.name: Banana
harvested_crops.description: A sweet tropical fruit with a unique flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Mango
harvested_crops.description: A sweet, tropical fruit with a unique flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Orange
harvested_crops.description: Juicy, tangy, and bursting with sweet summer flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Peach
harvested_crops.description: It's almost fuzzy to the touch.

harvested_crops.name: Apple
harvested_crops.description: A crisp fruit used for juice and cider.

harvested_crops.name: Pomegranate
harvested_crops.description: Within the fruit are clusters of juicy seeds.

harvested_crops.name: Oak Resin
harvested_crops.description: A sticky, fragrant substance derived from oak trees.

harvested_crops.name: Maple Syrup
harvested_crops.description: A sweet syrup with a unique flavor.

harvested_crops.name: Pine Tar
harvested_crops.description: A pungent substance derived from pine trees.

harvested_crops.name: Sap
harvested_crops.description: A fluid obtained from trees.

harvested_crops.name: Common Mushroom
harvested_crops.description: Slightly nutty, with a dense, meaty texture.

harvested_crops.name: Mystic Syrup
harvested_crops.description: A rare syrup with incredible energizing properties.

minerals.name: Quartz
minerals.description: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines.

minerals.name: Earth Crystal
minerals.description: A resinous substance found near the surface.

minerals.name: Frozen Tear
minerals.description: A crystal fabled to be the frozen tears of a yeti.

minerals.name: Fire Quartz
minerals.description: A glowing red crystal commonly found near hot lava.

minerals.name: Emerald
minerals.description: A precious stone with a brilliant green color.

minerals.name: Ruby
minerals.description: A precious stone that is sought after for its rich color and beautiful luster.

minerals.name: Topaz
minerals.description: Fairly common but still prized for its beauty.

minerals.name: Prismatic Shard
minerals.description: A very rare and powerful substance with unknown origins.

minerals.name: Copper Ore
minerals.description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.

minerals.name: Iron Ore
minerals.description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.

minerals.name: Gold Ore
minerals.description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.

minerals.name: Iridium Ore
minerals.description: An exotic ore with many curious properties. Can be smelted into bars.

minerals.name: Coal
minerals.description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.

foraging.name: Common Mushroom
foraging.description: Slightly nutty, with a dense, meaty texture.

foraging.name: Daffodil
foraging.description: A traditional spring flower that makes a nice gift.

foraging.name: Dandelion
foraging.description: Not the prettiest flower, but the leaves make a good salad.

foraging.name: Leek
foraging.description: A tasty relative of the onion.

foraging.name: Morel
foraging.description: Sought after for its unique nutty flavor.

foraging.name: Salmonberry
foraging.description: A spring-time berry with the flavor of the forest.

foraging.name: Spring Onion
foraging.description: These grow wild during the spring.

foraging.name: Wild Horseradish
foraging.description: A spicy root found in the spring.

foraging.name: Fiddlehead Fern
foraging.description: The young shoots are an edible delicacy.

foraging.name: Grape
foraging.description: A sweet cluster of fruit.

foraging.name: Red Mushroom
foraging.description: A spotted mushroom sometimes found in caves.

foraging.name: Spice Berry
foraging.description: It fills the air with a peppery smell.

foraging.name: Sweet Pea
foraging.description: A fragrant summer flower.

foraging.name: Blackberry
foraging.description: An early-fall berry with a nice, crisp flavor.

foraging.name: Chanterelle
foraging.description: A tasty mushroom with a fruity smell and slightly peppery flavor.

foraging.name: Hazelnut
foraging.description: That's one big hazelnut!

foraging.name: Purple Mushroom
foraging.description: A rare mushroom found deep in caves.

foraging.name: Wild Plum
foraging.description: Tart and juicy with a pungent aroma.

foraging.name: Crocus
foraging.description: A flower that can bloom through the snow.

foraging.name: Crystal Fruit
foraging.description: A delicate fruit that pops in your mouth.

foraging.name: Holly
foraging.description: The leaves and bright red berries make a popular winter decoration.

foraging.name: Snow Yam
foraging.description: This little yam was hiding beneath the snow.

foraging.name: Winter Root
foraging.description: A starchy tuber.
